insert into safety.alarm_record_result_test ( id, alarm_time, alarm_name, protocol, src_ip, attack_port, dst_ip, payload, is_safe_attack, attack_type, attack_field, is_successful, extract_info_prompt_tokens, extract_info_completion_tokens, extract_info_total_tokens, classify_multi_prompt_tokens, classify_multi_completion_tokens, classify_multi_total_tokens, classify_binary_prompt_tokens, classify_binary_completion_tokens, classify_binary_total_tokens, extract_info_use_time, classify_multi_use_time, classify_binary_use_time ) values
